verses.verse: For the director.[b] A psalm of David.
How long,[c] O LORD—will you forget me forever? How long will you hide your face from me?
How long must I suffer anguish in my soul and sorrow in my heart[d] day and night? How long will my enemy lord it over me?
Look upon me, O LORD, my God, and answer me; enlighten my eyes, lest I sleep in death,
lest my enemy say, “I have defeated him,” and my foes exult in my collapse.
As for me, I trust in your kindness;[e] my heart rejoices in your salvation.
